title: Three Little Mistakes
description: I sell sex, sin, and pleasure, but it isn’t just my business, it’s my entire life. I get off on the power of controlling it all.  She’s the one woman I can’t have.  She threatens everything, and yet I can’t stay away. There’s a beautiful, sexual creature inside this timid girl that’s desperate to claw its way out. I’m going to set it free, even if it brings my empire tumbling down.  I have to believe she’ll be worth all the little mistakes I’ve made.
author: Nikki Sloane
